name: Neon Amazing Dasher
description:
Those signs aren't gonna fix themselves! Rollerblade all over town to find broken neon signs, and dash into them to fix them! Try to get the best time you can!

Controls (Keyboard/Controller)

  • Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys + Control Stick/D-Pad
  • Jump - Space/Z + A
  • Dash - X (both haha)
  • Pause - Escape + Start
  • Quick Restart - R

Made for the Amaze Me Game Jam!
